channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: My dream Nikon lens has finally landed – an affordable 35mm f/1.2 prime
item.description: Viltrox gives the Z-mount treatment to its 35mm F1.2 LAB lens, which looks set to become my go-to documentary photography lens

item.title: Apple leak suggests an M5 Max iMac Pro is coming – here are 5 features I want to see
item.description: Apple’s iMac Pro could soon return with an M5 Max chip, a new leak claims.

item.title: Firefox security warning - multiple browser addons found to be riddled with malware, so be on your guard
item.description: More than a dozen Firefox extensions were secretly stealing money from affiliates and tracking people's behavior.

item.title: Mistral et les start-up françaises s’opposent frontalement à cette proposition de loi française sur l’IA
item.description: Ces sociétés tirent à boulet rouge sur la proposition de loi française, provenant du Sénat, qui veut mettre fin au « pillage » des auteurs par des outils d'intelligence artificielle.

item.title: Think twice about upgrading to Gemini for Home – it’s getting some tasks ‘absolutely wrong’ and is full of bugs
item.description: Gemini is taking over your Google smart home devices, but users are experiencing issues.

item.title: What Is a Micro RGB TV and Why You’re Gonna See Them Everywhere
item.description: Can the latest flavor of LCD screen technology finally beat OLED?

item.title: The best Garmin watches for training and everyday life
item.description: Few brands are as synonymous with outdoor sports as Garmin. You’ll find these fitness trackers and smartwatches on dozens of wrists at any 5K, marathon, or Ironman. You’ll also find Garmin devotees among divers, thru-hikers, golfers, kiteboarders — you name it. But these devices aren’t just for athletes. The company’s made significant strides in its […]...

item.title: Radiant Nuclear raises $300M for its semi-sized 1 MW reactor
item.description: Radiant Nuclear is developing a small modular reactor to replace diesel generators. The startup previously raised $165 million in May.

item.title: James Cameron Wants to Start Doing Things That Aren’t ‘Avatar’ Again
item.description: Cameron has a plan that may involve fewer blue aliens and more 'Terminator' (without Schwarzenegger).

item.title: Researchers Tested Herpes Drugs for Alzheimer’s. It Backfired
item.description: People given the herpes medication valacyclovir actually experienced worse cognitive decline than those given a placebo.

item.title: Scientists Thought Saturn’s Moon Titan Hid a Secret Ocean. They Were Wrong
item.description: For more than a decade, scientists have accepted that Titan, Saturn’s biggest moon, has a subsurface ocean of liquid water. A new look at the data suggests otherwise.

item.title: The Most Powerful Politics Influencers Barely Post About Politics
item.description: New research shows that social media creators have enormous influence over their audiences' politics—especially those who don't normally share political content.

item.title: Gemini 3 Flash is here, bringing a ‘huge’ upgrade to the Gemini app
item.description: Google is upgrading its Gemini app with Gemini 3 Flash, a more efficient version of its flagship AI model that's still capable of fielding complex requests. The new model will replace Gemini 2.5 Flash as the default inside the Gemini app, and it's headed to Google Search, too. Its arrival comes one month after the […]

item.title: AI’s water and electricity use soars in 2025
item.description: AI created as much carbon pollution this year as New York City and guzzled up as much H20 as people consume globally in water bottles, according to new estimates. The study paints what's likely a pretty conservative picture of AI's environmental impact since it's based on the relatively limited amount of data that's currently available […]

item.title: Peacock will bombard you with ads as soon as you open the app
item.description: Peacock has found a new place to stuff ads. Starting next year, the streaming service will greet you with an ad alongside your profile icon on the "Who's watching?" screen when you open the app. During a press briefing, Peacock parent company NBCUniversal showed off how these "arrival ads" might look. One image shows your […]

item.title: Google launches Gemini 3 Flash, makes it the default model in the Gemini app
item.description: Google is making Gemini 3 Flash the default model in the Gemini app and oAI model for Search

item.title: Google launches Gemini 3 Flash — and claims it's as fast as using traditional Search
item.description: Google just launched Gemini 3 Flash and promises it will revolutionize AI search.

item.title: Google's Gemini 3 Flash model outperforms GPT-5.2 in some benchmarks
item.description: Almost exactly a month after the debut of Gemini 3 Pro in November, Google has begun rolling out the more efficient Flash version of its latest AI model. According to the company, the new system offers similar "pro-grade" reasoning performance as its flagship model at a fraction of the cost, making it ideal for everyday use. In benchmarks, the new system performed significantly better than Google's previous generation models, including Gemini 2.5 Pro. More notably, in Google’s testing it managed to trade blows with GPT-5.2, the model OpenAI rushed out to counter Gemini 3 Pro. A table comparing...

item.title: Dernière chance pour Noël : Zendure et Valerion cassent les prix de leurs best-sellers tech [Sponso]
item.description: Zendure et Valerion affichent tous les deux de grosses promotions sur leurs produits phares juste avant Noël. Le pack SolarFlow 2400 AC + 2 batteries AB3000X perd ainsi 959 euros et le vidéoprojecteur Valerion VisionMaster Pro2 est à seulement 2399 euros.

item.title: Coursera and Udemy enter a merger agreement valued at around $2.5B
item.description: Coursera and Udemy, two of the biggest names in online learning, are combining platforms next year.

item.title: Quels sont les meilleurs chargeurs sans fil à induction pour smartphone en 2025 ?
item.description: La charge sans fil est désormais plus largement répandue pour les smartphones et les accessoires. Voici notre sélection des meilleurs chargeurs sans fil pour recharger tranquillement votre smartphone Android, votre iPhone ou encore vos écouteurs ou votre montre connectée.

item.title: Les lunettes Ray-Ban Meta (Gen 1) sont de retour à un super prix pour Noël
item.description: Même si Meta a récemment dévoilé la deuxième génération de ses Ray-Ban connectées, les premières, révélées il y a deux ans, restent toujours aussi intéressantes. Les Ray-Ban Meta Gen 1 sont en plus proposées à 247 euros au lieu de 329 euros.

item.title: Bluesky launches a privacy-focused ‘find friends’ feature without invite spam
item.description: The Bluesky contact matching feature is opt-in and your data won't be used to spam your friends, the social network says.

item.title: « Je suis très inquiet » : la vidéo du faux coup d’État qui affole l’Élysée et que Facebook refuse de supprimer
item.description: Une vidéo virale générée par intelligence artificielle, annonçant la chute d'Emmanuel Macron, a fait le tour du monde. Alerté par un homologue étranger paniqué, le président français a exigé son retrait. Le refus catégorique de Facebook révèle l'impuissance de l'État face aux géants du numérique.

item.title: SwitchBot’s space-saving robot vacuum is on sale starting at just $179.99
item.description: Small robot vacuums that fit into tight spaces rarely deliver strong performance, which is what makes the SwitchBot K11 Plus stand out. And right now, you can purchase the compact yet capable robovac from Amazon and SwitchBot for a new low of $179.99 ($220 off), the latter with code XMAS2GIFT55. Just note that only Switchbot […]

item.title: Creating apps like Signal or WhatsApp could be 'hostile activity,' claims UK watchdog
item.description: An independent review of the newly implemented National Security Act suggests that developers of encrypted messaging apps may be considered hostile actors. This, as lawmakers' pressure against encryption keeps growing.

item.title: Après Bosch, le spécialiste du vélo électrique Riese & Müller tourne aussi le dos au plus grand salon vélo d’Europe
item.description: C'est un choix totalement délibé : la célèbre marque allemande Riese & Müller annonce organiser son propre mini-salon... aux mêmes dates et à seulement 1h de route de l’évènement Eurobike 2026.

item.title: Warner Bros. Discovery rejects Paramount’s hostile bid, calls offer ‘illusory’
item.description: Warner Bros. Discovery called Paramount's offer "illusory" and said that the company had misled shareholders about its financing.

item.title: How to watch FIFA Intercontinental Cup Final on FIFA+ — Stream PSG vs Flamengo for *FREE*
item.description: Here's our streaming guide on how to watch the FIFA Intercontinental Cup Final between PSG and Flamengo for free.

item.title: Experts warn Chinese "Ink Dragon" hackers extend reach into European governments
item.description: Several dozen entities were recently targeted with an updated backdoor.

item.title: AI blindness is costing your business: how to build trust in the data powering AI
item.description: AI can only deliver real value when organizations build trustworthy, complete and real-time data foundations.

item.title: Mozilla’s new CEO says AI is coming to Firefox, but will remain a choice
item.description: Mozilla has appointed Anthony Enzor-DeMeo as its CEO, as the Firefox developer scrambles to adapt in a rapidly changing browser market.

item.title: Google’s vibe-coding tool Opal comes to Gemini
item.description: The company on Wednesday said it is integrating the tool, which lets you build AI-powered mini apps, inside the Gemini web app, allowing users to create their own custom apps.

item.title: Holidays 2025: retailers face a perfect storm of traffic, threats, and customer pressure
item.description: For retailers, the holiday season continues to be the biggest, most unforgiving moment in the calendar.

item.title: Say goodbye to muscle soreness with the five-star Theragun Pro Plus — on sale for a record-low price
item.description: The five-star Theragun Pro Plus is discounted to a record-low price of $529.99 just in time for Christmas.

item.title: Warner Bros. rejects Paramount deal, but the Netflix merger drama is only just beginning
item.description: Warner Bros. tells shareholders to reject Paramount deal, but Netflix hasn't won the merger fight yet.

item.title: Google Chrome : une simple page web permet de pirater votre PC, installez la mise à jour
item.description: Google colmate en urgence deux nouvelles failles critiques dans Chrome. Elles peuvent permettre d’exécuter du code à distance simplement en piégeant une page web. Google déploie en ce moment une mise à jour de sécurité pour protéger les usagers.

item.title: Steam Machine : cette fuite dévoile l’animation de démarrage, avec un clin d’oeil à un jeu culte de Valve
item.description: Un leaker a pu extraire l'animation de démarrage qui s'affichera au lancement de la Steam Machine.

item.title: We asked our staff for their 2026 predictions
item.description: In all the chaos of 2025, The Verge was able to see through the fog and focus on the consumer technology that really made an impact this year: robot vacuums, thin foldable phones, experimental laptops, handheld gaming consoles, and of course, generative AI. You can watch our standout picks in our video here. All this […]

item.title: Let’s talk about Fallout season 2
item.description: Years often go by between new seasons of big streaming shows - just ask fans of Severance or Stranger Things - but with Fallout the wait hasn't been so bad. The first season was a welcome surprise when it started streaming last April, managing to capture the series' distinctly playful take on the end of […]

item.title: Netflix’s next big TV game is FIFA soccer
item.description: The World Cup is happening next year, and Netflix and FIFA are working on a new soccer simulation game in celebration of the tournament. "This summer, when the world gathers to celebrate the FIFA World Cup 2026, fans can play a newly reimagined FIFA football simulation game exclusively on Netflix Games," Netflix says. The new […]

item.title: OnePlus 15R review: unbeatable battery life, beatable value
item.description: The OnePlus 15R's battery life is exceptional. It's a smidge better than the very impressive OnePlus 15's, and the 15R costs two hundred dollars less. So why am I having a hard time recommending it? Typically, OnePlus' R-series phone is a simplified, less-expensive follow-up to the main flagship - in this case, the OnePlus 15. […]

item.title: I tested the Sachtler Ace M MS Mk II video tripod, and it's the best set of legs for the modern content creator
item.description: The Sachtler Ace M MS Mk II video tripod offers modern content creators the perfect blend of portability and stability

item.title: The OnePlus 15R has landed with an even bigger battery than the OnePlus 15
item.description: The OnePlus 15R, OnePlus Pad Go 2, and OnePlus Watch Lite are now available to pre-order.

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Thursday, December 18 (game #1424)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Thursday, December 18 (game #655)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Thursday, December 18 (game #921)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: OnePlus 15R review: A 165Hz display and big battery for $700
item.description:
I know what you're thinking, didn't OnePlus release a new phone just last month? It did. A little over five weeks after the announcement of the OP15, the company is back with the OnePlus 15R, a more affordable version of its new flagship that starts at $700 (or $200 less than its sibling). Off the top, this will be a shorter review because most of what I said about the OnePlus 15 also applies to the OP15R. It's a great phone that asks you to make one pretty significant compromise.
Design and display
The OnePlus 15R's screen is slightly cooler than that of the OnePlus 15.
Igor Bon...

item.title: Boîte de réception | Marketplace, Facebook et faux courriels publicitaires
item.description: Chaque mercredi, notre journaliste répond à vos questions en lien avec le numérique et les nouvelles technologies. Cette semaine, vendre sur Marketplace, récupérer son compte Facebook et éliminer les courriels publicitaires.

item.title: OnePlus dévoile une montre ultra fine à la fonction inédite, le tout sous la barre des 180 euros
item.description: OnePlus a dévoilé sa nouvelle montre connectée d'entrée de gamme, la OnePlus Watch Lite, qui se distingue par son design fin et élégant et sa connexion simultanée à deux smartphones.

item.title: Test de la OnePlus Watch Lite : une montre fine, élégante et accessible qui mise tout sur la santé
item.description: Avec sa OnePlus Watch Lite, la marque chinoise propose une montre fine et plus accessible, mais toujours aussi élégante et dotée de nombreuses fonctions de santé.

item.title: Test du OnePlus 15R : il pulvérise tous les records d’autonomie pour un prix en chute
item.description: Outre un environnement logiciel séduisant, le petit frère du OnePlus 15 dispose d'un équipement performant, à l'image de son processeur Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 5, de son écran OLED 165 Hz, mais aussi - et surtout - de sa gigantesque batterie. De quoi satisfaire pleinement les joueurs.

item.title: "Unconstitutional": Federal judge blocks Arkansas social media safety law
item.description: A federal judge has hit pause on Arkansas's controversial social media law, ruling that Act 901 likely violates the First Amendment. Here is what you need to know.

item.title: Oscars shortlists for 12 categories have been revealed. Here’s who made the cut in 2025
item.description: The Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences released shortlists including for best song, score, and this year’s new prize, casting. Ryan Coogler’s bluesy vampire thriller “Sinners,” the big screen musical “Wicked: For Good” and the Netflix phenomenon “KPop Demon Hunters” are all a step closer to an Oscar nomination. The Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences released shortlists for 12 categories Tuesday, including for best song, score, international and documentary film, cinematography and this year’s new prize, casting.“Sinners” and “Wicked: For Good” received the most shortlist ment...

item.title: Le plus grand smartphone du marché voit déjà son prix baisser sur Amazon
item.description: Le TCL NXTPAPER 60 Ultra est un smartphone qui se distingue par son immense écran au confort visuel unique. Original, il devient surtout plus attractif avec une réduction de 90 euros, passant de 499 à 409 euros sur Amazon.

item.title: Ces 5 fabricants de TV sont accusés d’enregistrer en secret ce que vous regardez
item.description: Des constructeurs de télévisions parmi les plus importants au monde sont poursuivis en justice pour espionnage non consenti des utilisateurs.

item.title: The Surprising Way Hurricanes Pump Carbon Into the Air—and Life Into the Ocean
item.description: New research shows that tropical cyclones leave behind more than death and destruction.

item.title: You can play Fallout 76 completely for free this week — here's how
item.description: Here's how to play Fallout 76 — and all of its content — for free this week.
